page.title: 15SCHOOLS IN GT.YARNMOUTH
page.content: ALDERMAN SWINDELL FIRST SCHOOL,NEWTOWN,GT.YARMOUTH The school was opened on 9.9.29, by 80 years old Alderman T.W.Swin{dell. The school.is situated in Newtown. It was built to accomodate the growing number of families moving to this area, & takes both boys & girls. There have not been many changes to the building. It has 6 classrooms & an Assembly Hall,which is used as the Dining Room. There is an office for the Headteacher, and a staffroom. Only one extra classroom has been added although the number of pupils has increased from 89 to 210. The ages of the children are between 5&8 years, and this is their very first school. There are 7 teachers. At presen the smallest class is 23 and the largest 36 in number.
